description: Total costs aggregated by deployment group with currency conversion

configuration.query:
FROM billing_cluster_cost_lookup
| LOOKUP JOIN chargeback_conf_lookup ON @timestamp >= conf_start_date AND @timestamp <= conf_end_date
| EVAL cost_converted = total_ecu * conf_ecu_rate
| STATS total_ecu_sum = SUM(total_ecu), total_cost = SUM(cost_converted), deployment_count = COUNT_DISTINCT(deployment_id) BY deployment_group
| SORT total_cost DESC
